rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: A compact space combining the entrance with a minimalist living area. The layout emphasizes natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows on one side, which also serves as the primary source of sunlight for the interior. The design includes built-in storage to maintain minimalism while keeping clutter at bay.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A compact, functional kitchen integrated with the living area. The design includes energy-efficient appliances and open shelving to maintain a minimalist look. It adheres to Vastu principles by being placed in the southeast corner for prosperity.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom designed for comfort with a focus on simplicity. The room features floor-to-ceiling windows to allow abundant natural light, and is positioned in the north-east direction as per Vastu recommendations for health.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A single wide door at the front of the apartment, providing easy access and a welcoming atmosphere. The entrance is aligned to greet guests with natural light.

openings.name: Window Series
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living area and bedroom designed to maximize natural light, create an illusion of space, and provide views of the garden.

openings.name: Garden Access Door
openings.description: A door providing direct access to the large garden from the living area, designed for seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces. Vastu principles suggest having a garden view.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: A balcony that extends from the living area towards the garden, enhancing outdoor connectivity and allowing for additional seating space.

openings.name: Fire Exit Door
openings.description: An emergency exit door compliant with local building safety norms, located on the side of the apartment for quick evacuation.
